import React from 'react' export default function CartItem({item, value,functs}) { const { id, title, img, price, total, count} = item; const {val} = value const { increment, decrement, removeItem } = functs; return (
product : {title}
price : ${price}
decrement(id)}> - {count} increment(id)}> +
{/* */}
removeItem(id)}>
item total : ${total}
) }
